fields.name: 0pu6q4puds
fields.label: Penalty Interest Rate (%)
fields.description: Penalty Interest Rate is levied on the pending amount on a daily basis in case of delayed repayment

fields.name: 0pu6bbj69c
fields.label: Cyclic Day Of the Month
fields.description: Day of every month on which the repayment date is considered

fields.name: 0pu2gi2uoo
fields.label: Repayment Date On
fields.options:
Start of the next month
End of the current month
fields.description: Select whether the repayment date should be the end of the current month or start of the upcoming month

fields.name: 0pu1g20bpa
fields.label: Repayment Schedule Type
fields.options:
Monthly as per repayment start date
Pro-rated calendar months
Monthly as per cycle date
Line of Credit
fields.description: The schedule type that will be used for generating the term loan schedules (will affect the payment date and monthly repayment amount)

fields.name: 0puj94hquo
fields.label: Days Past Due Threshold for NPA
fields.description: Loans will be marked as NPA when the days past due count exceed this threshold

fields.name: 0pu94u5d8d
fields.label: Minimum days between Disbursement date and first Repayment date

fields.name: 0puf1ltiqo
fields.label: Excess Amount Acceptance Limit
fields.description: Excess amount repayment limit during loan closure

fields.name: 0pu7q9emd3
fields.label: Auto Write Off Amount
fields.description: Loan Write Off will be automatically created on loan closure request if pending amount is below this limit

fields.name: 0pu56cjhh5
fields.label: Grace Period in Days
fields.description: No. of days from due date until which penalty won't be charged in case of delay in loan repayment

fields.name: 0pu4735q81
fields.label: Collection Offset Sequence for Standard Asset

fields.name: 0puu1mn1rv
fields.label: Collection Offset Sequence for Sub Standard Asset

fields.name: 0pubqc93fj
fields.label: Collection Offset Sequence for Written Off Asset

fields.name: 0pu3nq6i3s
fields.label: Collection Offset Sequence for Settlement Collection
